categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic ranks

nodes.text: A High Jedi General, also referred to as Jedi High General, was the highest rank—short of becoming Master of the Order or the Grand Master of the Jedi Order—that a Jedi could obtain during the course of the Clone Wars. Only members of the Jedi High Council qualified for the rank. High Jedi Generals held command over one of the ten Systems Armies in the Grand Army of the Republic.
Jedi Masters Obi-Wan Kenobi, Shaak Ti, and Mace Windu were all High Jedi Generals.
